Head to the coast! Sure, Hyderabad isn't exactly beachfront property, but some fantastic beaches near Hyderabad are just a road trip away.Vizag tops the list - about 6 hours of driving gets you golden beaches and fresh sea air. The locals there are friendly, the seafood is incredible, and you can actually hear yourself think, unlike the city chaos. Machilipatnam is another option if you don't want to drive that far.Most tourists stick to the usual places to visit in Hyderabad - Charminar, Hussain Sagar Lake, and maybe Golconda Fort. Not that these are not good places, but doing a beach trip is a whole different ball game. Suddenly, your holiday is not about monuments and shopping malls.The tricky part? Getting everything organised. Save yourself the stress and check out our India Trip Packages. We handle the boring stuff so you can focus on making memories instead of making lists. In this guide, we’ll explore the best beaches near Hyderabad, their distance from the city, things you can do there, and why they are perfect for your next trip.List of Famous Beaches Near Hyderabad You Must Visit1. Suryalanka Beach – The Favourite Quick EscapeIf you ask anyone in Hyderabad about a beach trip, chances are the first name they’ll suggest is Suryalanka Beach. It is just about 350 km from the city, which makes it one of the most popular weekend destinations.This beach is wide, clean, and has shallow waters where you can easily wade around. Many people from Hyderabad head here for two-day trips. It is also one of the best spots if you’re planning a reunion with friends or a family picnic by the sea.The best part? You’ll find plenty of beach resorts near Hyderabad here. Staying overnight at a resort right next to the sea is a wonderful experience-you can wake up early to catch the sunrise and listen to the waves before the crowds arrive.Location: Bapatla, Andhra PradeshFamous for: Weekend trips, beach resorts, dolphin spottingDistance: 330 km from Hyderabad, approximately a 7-hour drive﻿Best time to visit: November to February2. Vodarevu Beach – Simple Yet BeautifulVodarevu Beach, located near Chirala, is a favourite among those who want simplicity. The beach is lined with coconut trees and fishing boats, giving it a natural coastal charm. Unlike the crowded tourist beaches, Vodarevu is laid-back, which is why many families from Hyderabad choose it for a peaceful weekend.It’s not just the beach-you can also explore Chirala town, which is famous for its handloom sarees. A beach holiday with some shopping sounds like a great combo, right?Location: Chirala, Andhra PradeshFamous for: Calm waters, long walks, and local fishing activitiesDistance: 310 km, about a 5–6-hour driveBest time to visit: October to March, when the climate is pleasant for outdoor activities.3. Manginapudi Beach (Machilipatnam)Most beaches have golden or white sand, but Manginapudi Beach near Machilipatnam stands out because of its black sand. That alone makes it one of the unique beaches near Hyderabad, with a distance being about 390 km.This beach also has strong cultural importance. It hosts the famous Krishna festival, where thousands of devotees gather to take a dip in the sea. On regular days, though, it is a calm place for picnics and short trips.Location: Machilipatnam, Andhra PradeshFamous for: Black sandy beach, Krishna festival celebrationsDistance: 350 km from HyderabadBest time to visit: November to February, when the weather is pleasant and ideal for outdoor fun.4. Bheemili Beach (Bheemunipatnam, Vizag)Bheemunipatnam, also called Bheemili, is another gem near Vizag. Unlike other beaches, this one has a mix of history and nature. It was once a Dutch settlement, and you can still spot colonial buildings and old churches near the shore.Walking along Bheemili Beach feels like stepping into a quieter world where time slows down. Families love coming here, and it’s also a good choice if you want to explore both heritage and the sea.Location: Bheemunipatnam, near VishakhapatnamFamous for: Colonial heritage, beach walks, and local seafoodDistance: 628–653 km5. Rushikonda Beach (Vizag) – A Blend of Beauty and AdventureRishikonda Beach, located in Vishakhapatnam, is often counted among the top beaches near Hyderabad. It is around 600 km away, so not a quick weekend option unless you take a flight to Vizag. But if you’re willing to travel, the beauty of Rishikonda will not disappoint you.The beach has golden sand and strong waves, which make it a favourite spot for adventure lovers. You can try water sports like jet skiing, surfing, or even parasailing here. The evenings are particularly beautiful, with locals enjoying walks, kids building sandcastles, and food stalls serving spicy Andhra snacks.If you are someone who enjoys both fun and relaxation, Rishikonda is one of the best beaches near Hyderabad to keep on your list.Location: 8 km from Visakhapatnam city, Andhra Pradesh.Distance from Hyderabad: Around 600 kmBest time to visit: October to February6. Yarada Beach – A Hidden ParadiseWhile most tourists head to RK Beach or Rishikonda in Vizag, very few know about Yarada Beach. This makes it one of the most peaceful beach places near Hyderabad. Imagine golden sands surrounded by green hills on three sides and the Bay of Bengal stretching endlessly on the fourth-that’s Yarada for you.It feels untouched and quiet, perfect for couples who want privacy or travellers who just wish to spend time with nature. Since it is less commercialised, you won’t find many restaurants or shacks, but that’s exactly what gives it its beauty.Location: 15 km from Visakhapatnam city, Andhra PradeshDistance from Hyderabad: Around 620 km (10–11 hours by road, also accessible via train or flight to Visakhapatnam).Best time to visit: November to February7. Ramakrishna Beach (RK Beach) – Heart of VizagWhen people talk about Vizag, the first thing they often mention is RK Beach. It is one of the most lively beaches near Hyderabad and a favourite for both locals and tourists. The seafront here is lined with museums, food stalls, and activity zones, which makes it a fun place to spend your evening.You can enjoy a stroll along the beach road, try local street food, or visit attractions like the submarine museum nearby. This beach is less about solitude and more about soaking in the city’s coastal vibe.If you’re planning to visit Vizag, you cannot miss RK Beach-it’s one of the top beaches near Hyderabad for family outings.Location: Located in the heart of Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh.Distance from Hyderabad: Around 620 km (10–11 hours by road)Best time to visit: October to March8. Kalingapatnam Beach – A Historical EscapeKalingapatnam Beach in Srikakulam is not just about the sea-it has history written all over it. This was once an important port during ancient times, and you can still see remnants of that era. The beach is quiet, and the sunsets are spectacular.It’s a little far from Hyderabad, but if you’re someone who enjoys history mixed with nature, Kalingapatnam is worth the trip.Location: Srikakulam district, Andhra Pradesh.Distance from Hyderabad: Around 700 kmBest time to visit: November to February9. Mypadu Beach – Peaceful Nellore GetawayIf you’re looking for a clean, less-crowded option, head to Mypadu Beach in Nellore. It has soft sand, calm waves, and a few resorts where you can spend the night. Many consider it among the best beaches near Hyderabad for families.You’ll also find fishermen bringing in their catch early in the morning, which makes it an authentic coastal experience. Fresh seafood served at local eateries is a must-try.Location: Nellore district, Andhra Pradesh.Distance from Hyderabad: Around 640 km (10–11 hours by road)Best time to visit: October to March when the weather is cooler.10. Kakinada BeachKakinada Beach is one of the best beaches near Hyderabad, where you can enjoy peace and natural beauty. Known for its wide sandy stretch and calm waters, it is perfect for a relaxed walk or family outing. Among the top beaches near Hyderabad, Kakinada attracts many visitors looking for a short coastal escape.The nearby Coringa Wildlife Sanctuary also adds to its charm, making it more than just a seaside spot. Many travellers choose this place while searching for beach resorts near Hyderabad, as it offers both leisure and comfort. It truly stands out among the beaches near Hyderabad.Location: Kakinada, East Godavari district, Andhra Pradesh.Distance from Hyderabad: Around 530 km (8–9 hours by road).Best time to visit: November to February, when the weather is cooler and ideal for beach outings.Why Visit These Beaches?The main reason people look for beaches near Hyderabad is to escape city life and enjoy nature. Whether it’s for a peaceful walk, adventurous water sports, or simply enjoying seafood by the shore, these beaches offer something for everyone.Many of these are also home to beach resorts near Hyderabad, where you can book a stay with your family or friends. Resorts at Suryalanka, Rushikonda, and Vizag are especially popular because they combine comfort with beautiful sea views.Tips for Planning Your TripBest time to visit: November to February is ideal since summers can be hot.Travel options: You can reach most of these beaches by road, train, or even flight (for Vizag).Stay: Book your beach resorts near Hyderabad in advance, especially during weekends.Food: Don’t miss local seafood dishes served at small shacks near most beaches.Safety: Swim only in safe zones since tides can be strong in some areas.Final ThoughtsEven though Hyderabad is not on the coast, you still have plenty of options when it comes to beaches near Hyderabad. From the closest ones like Manginapudi and Suryalanka to the scenic shores of Vizag like Rushikonda and Yarada, these spots are perfect for weekend trips or longer holidays.Whether you are looking for family time, romantic getaways, or adventurous water sports, the best beaches near Hyderabad promise relaxation and fun.
